resources.string:
sayPresent! is a mobile application attendance checker developed in android that help teachers log daily attendance to their students. 

 Once the application has started, you can immediately input your subjects and students.

 Click on the circular plus button in the bottom right corner of your screen to add a subject.
Warning: This will erase all of your data. You cannot recover data once this is executed.

Welcome to sayPresent!, your personal class attendance checker

 To get started, just follow these simple steps below

 1. Tap the Attendance tab below to show the list of subjects you're currently teaching

 2. Since you're just getting started, it is expected that the list is empty.

 3. Tap on the circular plus button to add a class.

 4. Once the class is added, tap on the class' name to check the available students.

 5. You will see another circular plus button to add students.

 6. Once finished, you can return back and log the students' attendance.

 7. To log their attendance, look for the Schedule tab that contains the calendar.

 8. Select the date to show the classes available in that day.

 9. Tap the class and you can log their attendance and click submit to finish.

 10. You're done! To check the student's record, just go to Attendance >> Name of Class >> Name of Student.


For more info, just go to the Help section.
